message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $20,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point.
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $17,000 for it. I believe it's a fair price considering the value it offers.

I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I'm aiming for a higher price point, I'm willing to come down to $18,500.  I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and provide significant value.

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $18,500, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $16,500 for the product. I'm looking for a good deal, but I'm also interested in making a purchase.
Bob, I understand your position and I'm trying to find a middle ground here.  My final offer is $17,500.  This is a very competitive price for a product of this quality.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $16,000 for the product. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.
